music.convert.trying: Trying to convert to a WAVE file...
warn.auth.token:
WARNING!
Do NEVER share the 'lclpnetwork.token' file!
With it, everyone could access your LCLPNetwork account.
So please pay attention to keep this file private!
cmd.scale.set.no_valid: There is no living entity target in your selection.
cmd.scale.set.success: Set entity size scale to %s for %s.
dia.pixie.tutorialbegin_1:
You are new here, aren't you?
My name is Pixie and I am your new assistant.

If you are ready, click §eNext§f to proceed.
dia.pixie.tutorialbegin_2:
Well well well, so you chose the race "%s".

Very interesting...
dia.pixie.tutorialbegin_3: Okay!! Follow me please, i'll give you a little tour...
dia.pixie.tutorialsecond_1: Well then, first you should get to know this place. It will be important later.
dia.pixie.tutorialsecond_2:
Currently, we are located in Sanctuary, the big alliance city of midgard.
This city is the center of this world since many different folks reside here jointly.
dia.pixie.tutorialsecond_3: From this location, there are four major paths in all directions, leading into the wilderness.
dia.pixie.tutorialsecond_4: For the beginning, you should stay here and understand the mechanics behind this world.
dia.pixie.tutorialsecond_5: Since I am your new companion, you'll have a relatively easy time.
dia.pixie.tutorialharbor_1:
There we are! The harbor of Sanctuary. People do a lot of trading here, since items can be shipped easily from here.
Other people do also use boats here to travel to other areas.
dia.pixie.tutorialharbor_2: You can trade here or search for someone to take you oversea.
dia.pixie.tutorialharbor_3: But first, you will need to complete the tutorial.
dia.pixie.tutorialharbor_4: Let's get you some equipment now!
multiplayer.disconnect.no_id: Your minecraft account could not be authenticated!
multiplayer.disconnect.lclpnetwork_down: LCLPNetwork Auth Servers are currently down.
multiplayer.disconnect.not_logged_in: You have not yet logged in with LCLPNetwork!
multiplayer.disconnect.already_linked: You have already linked your current LCLPNetwork account with another minecraft account! Please Switch to the linked account.
multiplayer.disconnect.no_character: You must create a character first!
multiplayer.disconnect.not_linked: Your minecraft account is not linked with your LCLPNetwork account yet. Please join a LCLPNetwork minecraft server to link them.
